title: Missing Gifted Skins
body:
So... I was gifted some skins and they seem to be missing D: 

[Gift history Screen Shot](https://gyazo.com/3ebecb9ebf2a42845cfbd452718c8adc) 
[Missing Kha Skin SS](https://gyazo.com/cd90f5a155a361cd7b0ebb00a0aa7d71)
[Missing Ez Skin SS](https://gyazo.com/f7e9dcc30709dd3384c237324e5c1553)
[Missing Dar Skin SS](https://gyazo.com/d6b9abdbcc7907d11291f23633cea955)
[Missing Anivia Skin SS](https://gyazo.com/f26d235fb010ccd68315e958522a6375)

But... my other skins are fine!
[Vayne Skin SS](https://gyazo.com/5d5656d672420454eb24d4f4bfd8a308)

If fraudulent activity is the case... I wish someone told me before just removing the skins.

replies.body:
We'll have to complete a thorough investigation to check into this, so I'd recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), as *Karn* mentioned. One of our account specialists will be happy to assist you from there on out.

Let me know if you have any questions.

This is not the place to get this issue solved for you, though you can get lucky with a random rioter on occasion.

Please submit a ticket instead https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
